description: Multiplied s Private Brunch for Builders & Investors @ Consensus Hong Kong Join us in Hong Kong, 11th of February 2026, for a curated brunch during Consensus, one of the most influential gatherings in crypto and Web3. Our Founders & VCs Brunch series has traveled across the globe to all major conferences. This time we bring it to Hong Kong, connecting a global mix of founders, VCs, family offices, and ecosystem partners in a relaxed setting before the intensity of Consensus begins. Expect: A curated group of investors, builders, and leaders from across DeFi, NFTs, infra, RWAs, and gaming A morning brunch designed for meaningful conversation without the noise of the main conference floor Opportunities to connect across both Eastern and Western markets at a pivotal financial hub If you are building or investing in the future of Web3, this is where valuable relationships begin. Past Events Founders & VCs Brunch and Lunch ETH CC Founders & VCs Brunch and Lunch TOKEN2049 Dubai Presented by: Multiplied A blockchain-native marketing, PR, and growth agency, Multiplied helps Web3 and disruptive tech companies amplify their narrative, capture market attention, and drive traction across DeFi, NFTs, Layer 1 & 2s, infrastructure, RWAs, gaming, and more. www.multipliedhq.com Want to Sponsor or Co-Host? Showcase your brand to top minds in the blockchain space.
